<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.FSMSchedulingAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Scheduling History updates from UI</description> <name>FSMSchedulingAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var FSMSchedulingAjax = Class.create(); FSMSchedulingAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { setManualSchedulingMethod: function() { var sys_ids = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysIds'); var response = JSON.stringify(new global.FSMSchedulingUtil().setManualSchedulingMethod(sys_ids)); return response; },
type: 'FSMSchedulingAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-30 17:09:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>55937c6f53323010b69addeeff7b123b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>FSMSchedulingAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Field Service Management" source="com.snc.work_management">b66bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4387</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_55937c6f53323010b69addeeff7b123b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-30 17:09:06</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
